comfort of online
therapy.
header.par:
Discover a safe space where you can explore

aboutus.title: Welcome to Pattug - A Warm Hug for Your Mental Health
aboutus.par:
“Pattug” is a Western Armenian word that means “hug.” Just like a hug, we believe that taking care of your mental health should feel comforting and supportive. Our mission is to make therapy as accessible and welcoming as possible for you.

We’re here to make your mental health journey smoother. With a wide range of qualified therapists to choose from, you can find the perfect match for your needs. Enjoy the benefits of online therapy from the comfort of your home, complete with easy appointment scheduling and payment options.

At Pattug, we believe everyone deserves the support they need. Join us in making your mental well-being a priority.

joinus.title:
Welcome to Pattug! 
We would love to have you
on our team.
joinus.par: We make it easier for you to deliver quality mental health care.
joinus.description: Pattug is an online therapy platform designed to connect clients and therapists. We are always looking for caring and empathetic therapists to join our team and provide quality mental heath care to our clients.
joinus.benefit1: Work from anywhere and enjoy the flexibility of choosing your own schedule.
joinus.benefit2: Gain unlimited access to a secure video call platform to conduct your sessions.
joinus.benefit3: Find clients effortlessly without having to promote your own social media page.
joinus.benefit4: Have access to easy appointment scheduling tools.
joinus.benefit5: Get paid instantly after every appointment.
joinus.qualityNote: Important: As quality is of utmost importance to us, we only accept applications from therapists who have a university degree in Psychology and are trained (or are in later stages of an ongoing training) in a specific therapy approach.
joinus.last: Please fill out the application form below and we will contact you.
joinus.thankyou:
Thank you for your application.
We will review it and get in touch with you in the next 2 business days.

applicationForm.languages: What languages can you provide therapy in?
applicationForm.chargePerSession: How much would you like to charge per session?
applicationForm.paymentNote: *Please be aware that the website will be taking 20% of each payment.
applicationForm.refuseDemographics: Are there any issues or demographics you would refuse to work with?

contactUs.title: We value your feedback
contactUs.par: Let us know if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions.

contactForm.title: Send a message and we will get back to you.
